backend/main.mo: Main canister logic defining data types, maps, auth mixins, and credential validation with default admin seeding plus storage and Kaizen/Observation management structures.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that ensures admin credentials exist by seeding a default admin when upgrading from actors with empty credential maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend change to prefill admin credentials and listing affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Precomputed summaries of many frontend files including pages, hooks, components, and utilities for build planning.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines all application routes with auth and role guards wrapping pages for dashboard, admin, manager, observations, and kaizen features.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth wrapper enforcing login, admin setup flow, and maintenance‑mode restrictions before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access guard that restricts admin and manager pages and shows an access‑denied alert when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyState: Reusable empty‑state component with optional image and action button.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenAss: UI panel for assigning a department and required tools to a Kaizen item with validation and mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenDec: Provides approve/reject actions for a Kaizen entry with comment validation and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenPho: Displays uploaded Kaizen implementation photos with timestamps and loading/empty states.
Handles image selection, validation, upload progress, and photo upload for a Kaizen item.
frontend/src/components/kaizen/KaizenSta: Renders a status badge for a Kaizen item based on predefined status-to-style mappings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top navigation bar showing user info, role-based links, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Simple layout wrapper providing container spacing for app pages.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog for initial user profile setup, capturing name and displaying assigned role.
Sends periodic activity pings to the backend when the user is active and authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching the caller's user profile, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating observations, kaizens, user roles, and credential operations via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
Shows confirmation of admin initialization and auto‑redirects to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/CredentialManag: Implements admin‑only credential management including authorization, creation, reset, enable, and disable actions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/MaintenanceMode: UI page that fetches, displays, and toggles system maintenance mode using a switch and alerts.
frontend/src/pages/admin/RoleManagementP: Form for assigning user roles by Principal ID with validation, success, and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the main dashboard showing observation and kaizen stats, with role‑based alerts and shortcuts.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenDetailPa: Displays detailed Kaizen info with admin-only decision and assignment panels and optional photo handling.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenFormPage: Form for submitting a new Kaizen suggestion with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/kaizen/KaizenListPage: Lists Kaizens with filtering, searching, admin visibility rules, and navigation to creation.
Form page for submitting a new Kaizen, handling validation, mutation, and navigation on success.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides a login form that validates credentials and routes users based on selected role.
frontend/src/pages/MaintenancePage.tsx: Displays a maintenance notification page with a sign‑out option clearing identity and cached queries.
frontend/src/pages/manager/AnalyticsPage: Displays analytics for observations and kaizens, including charts, counts, and calculated metrics.
frontend/src/pages/manager/GapsPage.tsx: Analyzes and lists low-activity areas and departments based on recent submission data.
frontend/src/pages/manager/InactivityDas: Shows inactive operators based on a configurable day threshold and supports CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/manager/OperatorActiv: Displays operator activity with sorting, inactivity calculation, and activity statistics.
frontend/src/pages/observations/Observat: Detail view for a single observation showing metadata, description, and navigation controls.
Page with a form to submit a new observation including type, title, description, and area, using mutation and navigation on success.
Alternate observation submission page with a simplified type list and similar form handling and submission flow.
Displays all observations with filtering, search, and role-based visibility, and provides navigation to create a new entry.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility functions to compute submission trends, top areas, approval rates, decision times, and low-activity segments.
frontend/src/utils/credentialSession.ts: Manages credential-based session storage, role tracking, and access-denial flags using sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Generates and downloads CSV files from an array of objects by constructing a blob and trigger link.
frontend/src/utils/loginSelection.ts: Maps backend credential errors to cleaner user-friendly messages with logic for common error patterns.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-routes handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state, including schema version, authentication change requests, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature records.
